Here's what I got, seems the boys from Merinci Mi are all dead, here they  
are telling me, seems daddy left them somewhere, maybe buried them late at  
night, I just hope they were not buried alive in some field, in a septic 
tank in  a farmers field with a back hoe, I got to see if they can tell me more 
 .   What the heck is wrong with all these parents killing their own  kids? 
 sf
